name: Keyboard Falling Blocks (Tetris)
description:
A complicated Tetris clone with the whole keyboard!

Read the manual! It explains a lot.

Settings has a load of customizable options. I prefer ghost and rolling cancel (on by default).

[1 to 0][q to p][a to ',][z to /] = to move pieces. row of key = rotations, column  of key = column

'1' would be 0 rotations, 1st column.

'2' would be 0 rotations, 2nd column.

'Q' would be 1 rotation, 1st column.

'X' would be 3 rotations, 2nd column.

shift = hold

space = cancel

enter = reset

\ = end game

Play in full screen or else you'll auto scroll.

Try to beat my 40 line high score of 77 seconds.

Check out my website.
